pages.text: The $(thing)Charcoal Kiln$() is a device used to produce charcoal. Charcoal kilns are multi-block structures.$(br2)Creating charcoal in a kiln is faster and more efficient with a $(thing)90%$() yield on charcoal and taking only $(thing)75%$() the normal time.$(br2)Default time is 13.5 hours.
The $(thing)Charcoal Kiln$() is made using fired clay bricks.

You will need to construct the charcoal kiln multi-block. The structure is made from the kiln block and five brick blocks. The center must be hollow.$(br2)The kiln will only be interactable if the structure is complete. Destroying the structure while it is lit will result in losing logs.
